title: Master Yi, with 18 deaths, calling his team "literal aids"
body:
This, my friends, is the epitome of solo-queue.

Hope you've enjoyed your time spent in ranked!

replies.body:
Just had a game where our shaco constantly told us all to slit our own wrists.

Remind me again why naming and shaming is frowned upon? Because Trib doesn't seem to be doing much right now. Haha.

The Tribunal doesn't exist. Anywhere. On any servers.

Riot are making a new Tribunal which will be released on all servers at the same time later.

2013 - Tribunal coming soon
2014 - Soon
2015 - Been in development for 2 years

All the death threats people send in chat followed by "Go ahead and report the system doesn't work"

Reds please dont link us to that FAQ we know the new system doesn't work.

And yet Reds do link us to the FAQ, especially when they have new news on it they update us.

There isn't any new news on the Tribunal because it ain't done. What's the point of saying everyday "It's in development" there is no point. You only report on your project when there is something newsworthy. LIKE IT'S COMPLETED!

Last Red Post I saw on the New Tribunal is to expect it late 2015/early to mid 2016.

But I can tell ya if you actually paid attention to any Red posts you'd see the community has been cleaning up its act.  Just because you alone play with shitlords doesn't mean everyone does.
Out of my last 100 games, I've only had maybe five at the most with any number of actually toxic pieces of shit.

Sure there have been feeders, the odd leaver, the person who'd normally be toxic but already has been warned officially so instead he just calls everyone tryhards and plays like a twat.
But the actual toxicity has dropped!
Unlike HL3 you wont die if you hold your breathe for the New Tribunal.
